item.description:

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")))) { { try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } }}

item.title: My member, commands doesn't work:(
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:1, topic:218392”]My member command doesnt work!
Or it does NAME,(space)NAME
How to get that fixed

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("GreenCore") try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }
Did i something wrong?, anyways,

Thanks, I D D S I[/quote]

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("GreenCore") try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }

See the +victim+? Try removing one of the +'s like I did in this code, and see if that helps…If not…I can’t help you. Try finding a new command? Or quit being lazy, and edit the files 1 by 1…
